title: Dodge Timer because client glitch

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I got into a game just now and when I clicked on ban I got a spinning wheel on the champion who I had chosen to ban. This lasted for about 20 seconds and then once the timer ran out I was removed and given a dodge timer for abandoning the game. Unfortunately I was not thinking about getting a screenshot of it at the time. I am 99% sure that it inst an issue with my internet.
